oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Vision 2014 to 2020. Nine Years After
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Niggli, Urs
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: • Organic has multi-actor thinking and especially acting in its "DNA" • "Reduced to the max" is the pragmatic approach taken by the scientific community around organic farm systems • "Innovation on farms first’ is the result of scarce resources" • Reliable concepts on how to reduce trade-off in agriculture and food consumption are still not yet visible. Organic is at least half-way there
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Niggli, Urs (2014) The Vision 2014 to 2020. Nine Years After. Keynote presentation at: Science Day 2014, BIOFACH Congress, Nürnberg, Germany, 14th February 2014. [Completed]
